title: Comment: Samsungâ€™s cameras keep getting better, but live HDR previews make me miss Pixel 6
content:
Smartphone cameras have come to a point where it’s genuinely hard to find a truly terrible camera in today’s market, leading to differentiators being relatively small. As I’ve been using Samsung’s latest devices, I’ve really come to value the live HDR that Google’s Pixel devices offer.

more…

The post Comment: Samsung’s cameras keep getting better, but live HDR previews make me miss Pixel 6 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: HDR is what makes modern smartphone cameras great, but it's also what sets Google's Pixel apart from Samsung's Galaxy smartphones.
